name: Pot of Luck
description:
Potluck game :)

Complete setting up for your potluck. RPG-Like and Bullet Hell.

Gather foods from your roommates for a multicultural potluck between a mixture of cultures (Turkish, Japanese, Italian, Mexican, Thai). But beware of the food fights! 

Note: Game is not complete and has no ending currently

Created by Anoushka S, Amy H, Rose L, and Juniper W for the 2020 Global Startup Cities Game Jam.

Controls

WASD to move, Space to Interact, Click to Interact with Special Objects and Dialog Options.

Credit

Programming by Anoushka S, Amy H, Rose L

Character and Food Art By Juniper W

NPC Pixel Art by Rose L
